definitions.title: vb. shew favour, be gracious
definitions.body: (NH id., Aram. [[חֲנַן]] h.an; Ar. h.an=a yearn towards, long for, be merciful, compassionate, favourable, inclined towards; Sab. [[חן]] in n.pr. [[חן מסבררהם]] DHM:Epigr. Denkm. 40; Ph. [[חנן]] in [[חן]] favour, and n.pr. as [[אלחנן]], [[חננבעל]]; As. in deriv. annu, grace, favour, unninu, têninu nannu, id., Lotz:TP Zim:BP 23, 66)—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Ju Jdg 21:22 favour us with them (2 acc.; i.e. by giving them to us).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in dealing with the poor, needy, and orphans, abs. Ps 37:21, Ps 37:26 = Ps 112:5; c. acc. Pr 14:31, Pr 19:17, Pr 28:8;

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: by considering and sparing, c. acc. De 7:2, De 28:50, La 4:16, Job 19:21, Job 19:21.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in the bestowal of favours, with acc. Ge 33:11 (E), Ge 43:29 (J), Nu 6:25 (P), 2Sa 12:22; double acc. Ge 33:5 (E), [[תּוֹרָֽתְךָ חָנֵּנִי]] be gracious unto me (in giving) thy law Ps 119:29.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: usually in the bestowal of redemption from enemies, evils, and sins; abs. Ps 77:10, elsewhere c. acc. Ex 33:19, Ex 33:19 (JE), Am 5:15, 2Ki 13:23, Is 27:11, Is 30:18, Is 30:19, Is 30:19, Is 33:2, Mal 1:9, Ps 4:2, Ps 6:3, Ps 9:14, Ps 25:16, Ps 26:11, Ps 27:7, Ps 30:11, Ps 31:10, Ps 41:5, Ps 41:11, Ps 51:3, Ps 56:2, Ps 57:2, Ps 57:2, Ps 59:6, Ps 67:2, Ps 86:3, Ps 86:16, Ps 102:14, Ps 119:58, Ps 119:132, Ps 123:2, Ps 123:3, Ps 123:3, Job 33:24.—Job 19:17 v. II. [[חנן]]

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 fs. [[נֵחַנְתְּ]] Je 22:23 be pitied (cf. [[נֵאַר]] √[[ארר]]) but LXX SyrVer Vulgate express groan (i.e. [[נֶאֱנַחְתְּ]]), which is favoured by context, and adopted by Hi Ew Gf Gie al.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. make gracious, favourable [[כִּי־יְחַנֵּן קוֹלוֹ]] Pr 26:25.

definitions.title: Poe‘l
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. direct favour to (Ges:§ 55, 1) [[וְאֶת־עֲפָרָהּ יְחׂנֵנוּ]] Ps 102:15; Pt. [[מְחוֹנֵן עֲנׇיִ֠ים]] Pr 14:21.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יֻחַן]] be shewn favour, consideration Is 26:10, Pr 21:10.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[הִתְחַנַּנְתָּה]] 1Ki 9:3 + 5 t. Pf.; Impf. [[וַיִּתְחַנֵּן]] 2Ki 1:13; [[וַתִּתְחַנֶּן־]] Es 8:3; [[אֶתְחַנׇּ֑ן]] Ps 30:9 + etc. + 6 t. Impf.; Inf. [[לְהִתְחֶנֶּן־]] Es 4:8; [[בְּהִתְחַנְנוֹ]] Ge 42:21—seek or implore favour:
of man, with [[אֶל]] Ge 42:21 (E) 2Ki 1:13; with [[לְ]] Job 19:16, Es 4:8, Es 8:3.
